message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at a price of $95. I believe it offers excellent value at this price point. What do you think?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your suggestion, but I was hoping to find the item for a bit less. Would you consider selling it to me for $85?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand you're looking for a good deal. How about we meet in the middle at $90?
I appreciate your response, Alice. I'll take that into consideration. Would you be willing to lower the price to $87?
